src:
林采緹爆半年沒啪啪啪遭酸　胡睿兒護妻嗆爆網友
01 Nov 2019, 02:45 by 張詠淇
「蛇姬」林采緹昨（31日）錄影前受訪時透露自己和剛分居的老公胡睿兒至少半年以上沒有「啪啪啪」的親密行為，新聞曝光後引起不少酸民留言攻擊，胡睿兒一早在臉書po文護妻，認為林采緹唯一做錯的事就是嫁給自己。
胡睿兒坦言的確很久沒有和林采緹有床事，但這都是自己造就，「我老婆有多愛我，我自己非常的清楚，我傷她有多深我自己也非常的清楚 ，你們跟本不了解她的痛苦及無奈，卻在地下自顧自做揣測留言，她是一位好媽媽，善解人意處處替人著想 永遠把自己擺在第二位的人，這樣好的人，你們是在靠爸什麼。」


林采緹最近積極拼工作，經常在臉書分享生活。（翻攝自林采緹臉書）

胡睿兒砲轟網友無謂攻擊， 「如果還有有什麼問題可以直接來問我，不管未來會如何，我永遠都站在我老婆這邊。」並表示為了老婆小孩不會再默不吭聲。
更新時間｜2019.11.01 03:17
text:
Lin Caizhen bursts half a year without suffering from acid Hu Ruier's wife and wife
01 Nov 2019, 02:45 by Zhang Yuqi
"Snake Ji" Lin Caiyi revealed that she and her newly separated husband Hu Ruier had no intimate behaviors of at least half a year before the video was interviewed yesterday (31st). After the news exposure, many acid people attacked the message. Hu Ruier was in the morning. Facebook's po text protects his wife, and believes that Lin Caizhen's only mistake is to marry himself.
Hu Ruier said frankly that she hadn’t had a bed with Lin Caizhen for a long time, but it’s all made by herself. “How much my wife loves me, I know very well how much I hurt her. I am very clear about myself. You don’t understand this. Her pain and helplessness, but in the underground self-conceived self-deprecating messages, she is a good mother, understanding people everywhere for the sake of people who always put themselves in second place, such a good person, you are relying on What is Dad?"


Lin Caixi has been actively working hard recently and often shares his life on Facebook. (Reflected from Lin Cai's Facebook)

Hu Ruier shelled the netizens with unnecessary attacks. "If there is any problem, you can ask me directly. Regardless of the future, I will always stand on my wife's side." He said that he will not be silent for his wife and children.
Update time|2019.11.01 03:17
